task_data.title: GOVERNANCE UPGRADE - Phase 3: Automated Data Lineage & Audit Trails. Implement comprehensive lineage tracking and audit trail system integrated with Phase 1 catalog and Phase 2 access control. Build LineageTracker class for recording all operations, implement comprehensive audit trail logging, create lineage visualization (source → transformation → target), add audit query interface and compliance reports. Success criteria: 100% operation lineage tracked, audit trail completeness 99.9%, lineage query response <500ms, compliance report generation <2 seconds.
